Hi there! I am a Ph.D. candidate at Rutgers Business School, under the supervision of [Dr. Jaideep Vaidya](https://sites.rutgers.edu/jsvaidya/){target="_blank"} at the Rutgers Institute of Data Science Learning and Application ([Rutgers iDSLA](https://sites.rutgers.edu/idsla/){target="_blank"}). ### Welcome to my personal website! {.mb-2}

---

I am a Ph.D. candidate of Information System at [Rutgers Business School](https://www.business.rutgers.edu/){target="_blank"} under the supervision of [Dr. Jaideep Vaidya](https://sites.rutgers.edu/jsvaidya/){target="_blank"}.  Before joining Rutgers, I obtained a M.S in Computer Science at University of Southern California and B.S. in Physics at Zhejiang University in China.

My expertise lies in the intersection of **data management**, **AI/ML**, and **healthcare data science**. I specialize in **AI/ML applications** for data quality improvement (e.g., missing data) and clinical, EHR, and genomics data analysis, as well as advancing **generative AI** techniques for synthetic healthcare data generation to address **data privacy** and **ethical** issues.
